member.name: T:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiContext
member.summary: Represents the core runtime state for issuing immediate-mode UI commands.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiContext.#ctor(ImGuiSharp.ImGuiIO)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The IO configuration for the context. If null, a new instance is created.

member.name: P:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiContext.IO
member.summary: Gets the IO configuration associated with this context.

member.name: P:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiContext.IsFrameStarted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a frame is currently in progress.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiContext.NewFrame
member.summary: Begins a new frame, preparing internal state for UI commands.
member.exception: Thrown when a frame is already in progress.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiContext.EndFrame
member.summary: Ends the current frame, finalizing draw command generation.
member.exception: Thrown when no frame has been started.

member.name: T:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiIO
member.summary: Holds per-frame input configuration consumed by ImGui during frame evaluation.

member.name: P:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiIO.DeltaTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the elapsed time between frames in seconds.

member.name: P:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiIO.DisplayWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the logical width of the display surface in pixels.

member.name: P:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiIO.DisplayHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the logical height of the display surface in pixels.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.ImGuiIO.Reset
member.summary: Resets the per-frame input to defaults typically used for the first frame.

member.name: T:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawCommand
member.summary: Represents a single render command with its associated metadata.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawCommand.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawCommand.ElementCount
member.summary: Gets the number of indices to draw for the command.

member.name: T:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawData
member.summary: Represents the draw data emitted by the core runtime for a single frame.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawData.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawList})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The draw lists that should be submitted to the renderer.

member.name: P:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawData.DrawLists
member.summary: Gets the draw lists composing the frame output.

member.name: T:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawList
member.summary: Represents a single draw list containing GPU-ready primitives.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawList.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawCommand})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The commands describing how to render the list.

member.name: P:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawList.Commands
member.summary: Gets the commands associated with this draw list.

member.name: T:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.IRenderPipeline
member.summary: Describes a rendering pipeline capable of translating ImGui draw data into GPU commands.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.IRenderPipeline.BeginFrame
member.summary: Prepares the pipeline for a new frame, ensuring underlying resources are ready.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.IRenderPipeline.Render(ImGuiSharp.Rendering.ImGuiDrawData)
member.summary: Submits draw data generated by the core library to the GPU.
member.param: The draw data instance describing command lists to render.

member.name: M:ImGuiSharp.Rendering.IRenderPipeline.EndFrame
member.summary: Completes the frame, presenting results or flushing commands as required.
